name: Dream Rooms
description:
Play using mouse only, no keys.

Enter the dreams of the children and exchange things until everyone is happy!

The game was created in the Geta GameJam window time frame (72H) on hard mode (No text), from concept to execution. All assets, music and coding were created inhouse.

The team
Aléxis Kiosia - Music and Script
Andre Vitor Paganini - Developer and Animator
Felipe Ricardo - 3D artist and Texturing
Gustavo Duarte Linares - 3D artist and Logo
Marco Túlio - Texturing
Vinícius Uzêda - Developer
Vinicius Gardelli - Developer

All members - Concept and Game Design
